Description: eSM module: Order of speed limitsfor multiple SLS in positive directionis incorrectParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: The values for the speed limits formultiple SLS are not in ascendingorder.
Correctives: Set correct speed limits for multipleSLS.

Description: eSM module: Order of speed limitsfor multiple SLS in negative directionis incorrectParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: The values for the speed limits formultiple SLS are not in ascendingorder.
Correctives: Set correct speed limits for multipleSLS.

Description: eSM module: Invalid speed limit formultiple SLS in positive directionParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Speed limit for multiple SLS inpositive direction has a value of zero.
Correctives: Set a speed limit not equal to zero formultiple SLS.

Description: eSM module: Invalid speed limit formultiple SLS in negative directionhas a value of zeroParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Speed limit for multiple SLS innegative direction has a value ofzero.
Correctives: Set a speed limit not equal to zero formultiple SLS.

Description: eSM module: Two types of multipleSLS selected at the same timeParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: eSM module: Two types of multipleSLS selected at the same time.
Correctives: Select a single type of multiple SLS.

Description: Module in fieldbus slot not correctlydetectedParameter _SigLatched Bit 21
Cause: Fieldbus module not correctlymounted in the slot.Unsupported fieldbus moduleinserted.Fieldbus module inoperative.EMI.

Description: Indeterminable type of fieldbusmodule detected in fieldbus slotParameter _SigLatched Bit 21
Cause: The type of module detected infieldbus slot is not supported by thedrive.
Correctives: Use supported type of fieldbusmodule. Refer to manual or catalog.

Description: Fieldbus module in slot 3 missingParameter _SigLatched Bit 21
Cause: Fieldbus module has been removedor fieldbus module is inoperative.
Correctives: Confirm or cancel HMI dialog box forfieldbus module replacement.Install a new fieldbus module.

Description: Parameter access error detected infieldbus module
Cause: Fieldbus module parameter does notexist or cannot be written.

Description: Fieldbus module in slot 3 has beenchangedParameter _SigLatched Bit 21
Cause: The fieldbus module has beenreplaced by another type of fieldbusmodule.
Correctives: Confirm the new fieldbus module viathe HMI dialog.

Description: Internal timeout in communicationwith fieldbus module
Cause: Internal communication with fieldbusmodule not correct.Fieldbus module inoperative.EMI.

Description: The module detected in the slot forfieldbus modules slot is notsupported.Parameter _SigLatched Bit 21
Cause: The module detected in the slot forfieldbus modules is not supported byolder drive hardware revisions.

Description: Module IOM1: System errordetected: Calibration analog/digitalconverter during manufacturingParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Module IOM1: System errordetected: InitializationParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
